welcome_message_body: Welcome to Surakarta, Indonesia! Get ready to be enchanted by the city's rich Javanese culture, stunning historical sites, and vibrant art scene. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Surakarta has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Soto Daging Sapi Bu Hadi
restaurants.description: Soto Daging Sapi Bu Hadi is a soup spot located in Surakarta.
restaurants.address: Jl. Yosodipuro No. 43, Surakarta, Jawa Tengah 57132
